Package ohos.multimodalinput.standard

Provides classes for handling standards events to which input events of different input devices are mapped.
Since:
5
  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CommonEventHandle
    Provides methods for handling standard common events.
    KeyEventHandle
    Provides methods for handling standard key events.
    MediaEventHandle
    Provides methods for handling standard media events.
    StandardizedEventHandle
    Represents the base interface of all types of standard events.
    SystemEventHandle
    Provides methods for handling standard system events.
    TelephoneEventHandle
    Provides methods for handling standard call events.
    TouchEventHandle
    Provides methods for handling standard touch events.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    MultimodalEventHandle
    Provides methods for handling standard events, including registering and deregistering a standard event.
